AzureBlade:
If you permit, oh you Cooliness, why do you ask the help of us, little 
jabronies?


>From: Legendarynemasis@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: A Greeting.
>Date: Mon, 13 Aug 2001 08:48:23 EDT
>
>Devil Gigatron grins as Azure and Whistler both shut up and then turns back
>to Iron Raptor.
>
>Devil Gigatron: "Now you see, peace is not the answer. Devil Gigatron knows
>peace isn't the answer because of the amount of monkey crap bots on this 
>past
>Earth. Instead of going around whining and begging every faction of 
>Jabroni's
>on this dust ball Devil Gigatron suggests this... Devil Gigatron says that 
>we
>should cut the crap and lay the Giga-Smackdown on every base on this damn
>planet. Although apparently something in leadership here seems to be
>lacking... Devil Gigatron sees you have a mighty big base here, yet, it 
>looks
>like something out of a slum where Drive bys are frequent! Instead of
>constantly sitting here asking for peace or something which I believe you
>Jabronis are doing, you should get get with the program and beat the mess 
>out
>of other factions before..."
>
>Devil Gigatron grins and then transforms into a gigantic hand.
>
>Devil Gigatron: "Before Devil Gigatron decides to lay the Giga-Slapdown on
>you not once(he then holds up only one finger), not twice(now having two
>fingers up), But Three times!!!"
>
>Three fingers are now raised and point at Iron Raptor before Devil Gigatron
>transforms into robot mode. He then looks up into the sky with his hands up
>before he places one up to his mouth while holding a microphone not there
>before.
>
>Devil Gigatron: "If you smeeeellllll what Devil Gigatron.... is cooking!"
